responsibilities: Architect and develop simulation tools to understand subsea product performance in various scenarios
Develop and implement hydrodynamic modeling and simulation capabilities for data capture during testing
Rapidly iterate on modeling and simulation capabilities during test periods
Collaborate with the GNC team to maximize field test outcomes
Simulate and analyze test data using appropriate tools and processes
Create test and simulation fixtures for software- and hardware-in-the-loop operations
Work with multi-disciplinary experts to model sub-system, system, and system of system dynamics
Collaborate with internal and external customers to understand simulation requirements and develop solutions
qualifications: Proficiency with scientific computing systems (e.g., MATLAB, Simulink) and scientific Python (e.g., NumPy, SciPy)
Experience with subsea vehicles and/or aerospace/aeronautical systems
Experience with developing sub-system and system level models
Experience with model development for Guidance, Navigation, and Control algorithm development
Ability to liaise with other engineering functions to diagnose and remediate design issues
Experience building computational meshes for CFD analysis
analysis:
The job responsibilities and skills listed are focused on developing simulation tools, hydrodynamic modeling, and working with subsea and aerospace systems. The responsibilities include tasks such as developing simulation capabilities, analyzing test data, and collaborating with teams to model system dynamics. The skills required include proficiency with scientific computing systems like MATLAB and Simulink, familiarity with programming languages like C++ and Python, and experience with subsea vehicles and aerospace systems.

There is no mention of Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is on scientific computing, simulation, and modeling in the context of engineering and physical systems, rather than on natural language processing or AI model development.

Therefore, this job does not involve working with Generative AI or language models.
